name: PublishTestResultScreenshot
description: Get more insight on your test failures with contextual screenshots.
author: Genetec

inputs.name: organization
inputs.label: Organization
inputs.helpMarkDown: Your organization name. Needed to access Azure REST Api (dev.azure.com/{organization})

inputs.name: screenshotFolder
inputs.label: Screenshot folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The folder where the task searches for screenshots

inputs.name: includeRelease
inputs.label: Include Release
inputs.helpMarkDown: Include the results of test failures during a release

inputs.name: releaseContext
inputs.label: Release Context
inputs.helpMarkDown: The publish context of a release. Valid options are 'CD' and 'CI'.

inputs.name: separator
inputs.label: Separator
inputs.helpMarkDown: Separates the class name from the expectation name.
